rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Bohemian design elements including exposed brick accents and natural wood furnishings.
Modern yet rustic kitchen incorporating Vastu principles with eastward orientation to enhance positive energy flow.
Cozy master bedroom featuring Bohemian decor with comfortable seating and natural light; placed in the southwest direction per Vastu to ensure peace.
Functional bathroom with minimalist design ensuring privacy and proper ventilation as advised by local building norms.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to harness positive Vastu energy with a welcoming facade.
Windows in the master bedroom facilitating natural light and ventilation while aligning with local aesthetic norms.
Interior doors using reclaimed wood to complement Bohemian design.

additional_features.description: Bohemian-inspired swimming pool integrated into the farmhouse design. Positioned to maintain a harmonious balance with the surrounding garden and adhere to local safety guidelines.
